title: Welcome

title: myportfolio
text:
Hello! I‚Äôm Ritusri Mohan, a passionate data analyst and digital strategist dedicated to transforming data into actionable insights. My journey began with a fascination for numbers and patterns, which led me to pursue advanced studies in Applied Business Analytics and Data Science. Over the years, I‚Äôve had the privilege of working on diverse projects‚Äîranging from predictive modeling and market research to creative digital marketing campaigns‚Äîthat have helped businesses make smarter, data-driven decisions.
What excites me most about my work is the intersection of analytical rigor and creative problem-solving. I thrive on uncovering trends, telling stories through data, and building solutions that drive real impact. My core values are curiosity, collaboration, and continuous learning, and I bring these to every project I take on.
Outside of work, you‚Äôll find me exploring new technologies, mentoring aspiring analysts, or capturing moments through photography. I believe that a well-rounded life fuels innovative thinking and meaningful connections.
Feel free to browse my portfolio to see examples of my work, and don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out if you‚Äôd like to collaborate or just say hello!

*This page is designed to give you a glimpse into my professional journey, values, and approach. For more details about my projects and experience, check out the rest of my portfolio or connect with me directly.

title: myportfolio
text:
From your resume, your GitHub link is: https://github.com/ritusri4.
Here‚Äôs content for your ‚ÄúProjects and Internships‚Äù page, incorporating details from your resume:

title: myportfolio
text:
Projects and Internships

Projects
Capstone Project: Leveraging Digital Tools for Stakeholder Management in A Collaborative Business Model

Analyzed partner relationships within the ecosystem of RailWire.
Explored touch points and interactions to enhance understanding and improve overall ecosystem efficiency.

Customer Churn in DTH Company

Conducted exploratory data analysis and developed a churn prediction model for a Direct-to-Home (DTH) company.
Provided analytical insights and business recommendations based on the findings.



Internships
Zenoti, Hyderabad (Feb‚Äô23-May‚Äô23)

Conducted data analysis using Python and Excel.
Developed a Python algorithm to identify client attrition thresholds.
Evaluated revenue potential by appraising gift cards and mobile applications.
Presented and implemented business concepts, earning acceptance from Zenoti management.

RailTel Corporation of India Ltd, Hyderabad (Feb‚Äô21-Aug‚Äô21)

Conducted comprehensive marketing analysis to identify market trends, customer behavior, and competitive landscapes.
Contributed to strategic decision-making by providing valuable insights based on the analysis of market data.
Developed a deeper understanding of the telecommunications industry.

National Mineral Development Corporation (NMDC), Hyderabad (Jun‚Äô19-Jul‚Äô19)

Conducted industrial training focused on the ‚ÄúAnalysis of Iron Ore Grade‚Äù extracted from NMDC mines.
Applied analytical techniques to assess the quality and characteristics of iron ore.
Gained practical insights into the mining industry and hands-on experience with ore analysis.

This is the link to my github page:https://github.com/RitusriMohan/Tech_Insight_Hub This is the link to academic portfolio:https://eportfolio.mygreatlearning.com/ritusri-mohan
